title: A Friendly Favor
description: Julian has been single for over a year and has given up. His life is now one of work, Netfilx, and Chinese delivery.Matt has just been dumped hard, leaving him adrift and struggling to get through ever longer days.Julian doesn’t believe in one-night stands, and Matt isn’t looking for a rebound, but a friend in need of release can be a powerful motivator. And it will only be one night.
author: Simone San Pablo
